channel.description: Testing x = int(input("Enter a number: ")) y = int(input("Enter a number: ")) if x + y > 10: print("Branch 1") else: print("Branch 2") if x - y > 10: print("Branch 3") else: print("Branch 4") x = 6 | y = 6 x = int(input("Enter a number: ")) y = int(input("Enter a number: ")) if x + y > 10: print("Branch 1") else: print("Branch 2") if x - y > 10: print("
